generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by trees and vegetation, and on the right side, adjacent to parked cars and a building.
- building: A multi-story building with arched windows and a light-colored facade is prominently visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage line both sides of the road, and some bushes are visible along the sidewalk on the left.
- traffic sign: Blue parking signs (P) are visible on poles along the right side of the road, and a "No Parking" sign is also visible.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those holding traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the building.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, including a silver sedan and a black car in the foreground.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
